docs.snippet: Carmelo Anthony led the Knicks past the Bucks, becoming the first Knick with 40 points or more in three straight games since Bernard King in 1984....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony led the Knicks past the Bucks, becoming the first Knick with 40 points or more in three straight games since Bernard King in 1984.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks beat Milwaukee Bucks, 101-83; Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony scores 41 points, becoming first Knick with 40 points or more in three straight games since Bernard King in 1984.

headline.seo: Knicks Win 11th Straight as Carmelo Anthony Reaches 40 Points Again
headline.main: Knicks Win 11th Straight as Anthony Hits 40 Again
headline.print_headline: Knicks Win 11th Straight As Anthony Scores 41

docs.lead_paragraph: The Denver Nuggets will be without the versatile forward Danilo Gallinari for the rest of the season after tests showed he tore his left A.C.L. against Dallas on Thursday.
docs.abstract: Denver Nuggets will be without forward Danilo Gallinari for rest of season after tests show he tore his left anterior cruciate ligament.

headline.main: Nuggets Without Gallinari for Rest of Season

docs.snippet: A Grinnell College player scored a record 138 points in a rout over Faith Baptist Bible, and with his accomplishment came thoughts on ethical behavior in such games....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Grinnell College player scored a record 138 points in a rout over Faith Baptist Bible, and with his accomplishment came thoughts on ethical behavior in such games.
docs.abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column examines punishing basketball defeat delivered by Grinnell college to Faith Baptist and moral and theological questions that it raises; many have lauded performance of Grinnell's star player Jack Taylor, who scored NCAA record of 138 points, others have compared extent of defeat to sin of gluttony; both teams have been left to interpret their roles through Biblical lens.

headline.seo: A Basketball Blowout Raises Theological Questions
headline.main: A Basketball Blowout and Its Celebration Raise Theological Questions
headline.print_headline: A Basketball Blowout and Its Celebration Raise Theological Questions

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Faith Baptist Bible College and Theological Seminary (Ankeny, Iowa)
